name: Barber Grooming
description:
Barber Grooming  - Cut client's hair to their targeted hair styles.  Make sure to line up the hair line with the cutting tool properly and rotate the heads to cut at the back.

Controls:

For Target Head Model: 'W' to rotate and 'S' to Stop.

For Client Head Model: 'E' to rotate and 'D' to Stop & Click on hair to cut hair.

Barber Grooming:

3 Levels

3 Target Hairstyles

Test your haircutting skill in this game
